EmailTemplate.name: ATS ITAR transfer to Military ATS
EmailTemplate.subject: Potential ITAR
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your original email may have contained ITAR restricted information. As such it has been purged from our system. Your original email has been moved to our secure email server. Please know that we are still working on your question but do not reply to any email from the previous case.
In the future if you are sending an email which might contain ITAR information please Email your question to MilitaryAeroTechSupport@Honeywell.com. Thank you for your understanding.
Best regards,
Honeywell Aero Tech Support
